= Supported Controllers =
You find a list of supported and tested boards and controllers here.

  * 32 Bit and 64 Bit PC-Linux
  * MICA2 Board (atmega128)
  * Charon2 (atmega128)
  * [http://code.google.com/p/bajos/wiki/BajosAndArduino ArduinoMega (atmega1280, atmega2560)]
  * NGW100
  * STK1000
  * EVK1100
  * [http://code.google.com/p/bajos/wiki/EVK1104 EVK1104]
  * XPLAIN- board (experimental)
